mapper.select: SELECT solt.Sales_Order_lNo, solt.Sales_Order_lCus_No, pit.Product_Item_Name Sales_Order_lName, solt.Sales_Order_lCode, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 Sales_Order_STND_1, solt.Sales_Order_lQty, solt.Sales_Order_lSum, solt.Sales_Order_lUnit_Price, solt.Sales_Order_lPrice, solt.Sales_Order_lNot_Stocked, solt.Sales_Order_Send_Clsfc, solt.Sales_Order_lInfo_Remark FROM Sales_OrderList_tbl solt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON solt.Sales_Order_lCode = pit.Product_Item_Code WHERE Sales_Order_lCus_No = #{SalesOrderNo} ORDER BY Sales_Order_lNo

SELECT S_ItemCode, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME S_ItemName, S_Qty, S_WareHouse, B.Product_Info_STND_1 S_Item_Standard_1, B.Product_Info_STND_1 S_Item_Standard_2 FROM Stock_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B ON A.S_itemCode = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE where A.S_itemCode = #{ItemCode}
mapper.insert: insert into Sales_OrderList_tbl ( Sales_Order_lNo, Sales_Order_lCus_No, Sales_Order_lCode, Sales_Order_lQty, Sales_Order_lSum, Sales_Order_lUnit_Price, Sales_Order_lPrice, Sales_Order_lNot_Stocked, Sales_Order_Send_Clsfc, Sales_Order_lInfo_Remark ) values ( (select ifnull(max(SubList.Sales_Order_lNo)+1,1) from Sales_OrderList_tbl AS SubList where Sales_Order_lCus_No = #{Sales_Order_lCus_No}), #{Sales_Order_lCus_No}, #{Sales_Order_lCode}, #{Sales_Order_lQty}, #{Sales_Order_lSum}, #{Sales_Order_lUnit_Price}, #{Sales_Order_lPrice}, #{Sales_Order_lQty}, #{Sales_Order_Send_Clsfc}, #{Sales_Order_lInfo_Remark} ) on duplicate key update Sales_Order_lQty = #{Sales_Order_lQty}, Sales_Order_lUnit_Price = #{Sales_Order_lUnit_Price}, Sales_Order_lPrice = #{Sales_Order_lPrice}, Sales_Order_lNot_Stocked = #{Sales_Order_lQty}, Sales_Order_Send_Clsfc = #{Sales_Order_Send_Clsfc}, Sales_Order_lInfo_Remark = #{Sales_Order_lInfo_Remark}
mapper.update: UPDATE Sales_OrderList_tbl A, (SELECT @rank:=0) B SET A.Sales_Order_lNo = @rank:=@rank+1 where A.Sales_Order_lCus_No = #{Sales_Order_lCus_No}
